storyblokEntry.content: {"_uid":"dc1ec3a8-61f8-4399-8874-4d4c06e979b6","body":[{"id":"hero","_uid":"1a753aff-6cbc-4225-ab4b-a74d0a8a4d1b","main":[{"_uid":"42e41368-6d94-41f7-9fd6-0207f1aa94a2","title":"zombiecraig","component":"work_hero"}],"theme":"dark","padding":"8","spacing":"20","component":"section","isAnimated":false,"px_padding":"","full_height":false,"isFullWidth":true},{"id":"","_uid":"c99b9557-e564-4f81-8dee-82aaf4cacaa8","main":[{"id":"overview","_uid":"6fb12dec-cea7-4526-bde8-a0a1422889ea","main":[{"_uid":"bc0257a4-3886-4173-964e-f2a8d7df972a","text":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"One thing I am proud of is zombiecraig. Which started out many years ago as a dumb nickname turned into a simple illustration brand. Just my personal artwork, which has evolved and changed over the years but has always stayed \"weird\", \"morbid\", \"scary\", \"stupid\" or as more than one person said \"creepy\".","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"I shut the Etsy shop a in 2019 just before the pandemic, but still like to keep the posts going. Mostly for myself but sometimes for that sweet validation from instagram likes.","type":"text"}]}]},"alignment":"left","component":"header","isScrolling":false,"header_items":[],"animatedTitle":""},{"cta":"instagram","_uid":"88ce9304-ed70-443f-9884-5ea350fa44c4","link":{"id":"","url":"https://www.instagram.com/zombiecraig/","linktype":"url","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"https://www.instagram.com/zombiecraig/"},"variant":"contained","component":"button"},{"_uid":"6eae4c1a-b833-4297-8db8-204dd3dcff38","component":"insta_feed"}],"theme":"light","padding":"20","spacing":"20","component":"section","isAnimated":false,"px_padding":"content","isFullWidth":false}],"theme":"light","component":"contentSection","isAnimated":false,"side_title":"zombiecraig","side_content":[{"_uid":"54633cc2-1a0c-4eee-a3ce-0fc581aaadeb","link":{"id":"a786189f-06ca-43ef-9166-8411da0fde24","url":"","anchor":"overview","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"work/zombiecraig"},"text":"Overview","component":"list_item"}]}],"component":"page"}
